biotools.summary: A software package that enables users to assess the sizes and distribution of telomeric fragments represented in autoradiograph images of agarose gels. The hybridization from multiple matching telomeric probes is corrected for and simple statistics and plots are generated for each selected lane.

bioschemas.name: Telometric
